Title: Collision
Plot: After her night with Brody, Claire wakes up in the last place she would have imagined. Matt meets a couple of men who seem to know too much about him. Mohinder Suresh finds one of the heroes. Hiro's plan backfires in Las Vegas. Linderman's assistant makes more trouble for Niki just as Nathan arrives in Las Vegas to talk to the crooked casino owner about a campaign contribution. Isaac paints a bleak future for Claire. Peter receives a cryptic message from a very unexpected source.
GuestStars: Mark Nearing, Paydin LoPachin, Matt Bushell, Kristen Veitch, Toni Lewis, Mark Allen Stewart, Ashlee Gillespie, Nicole Bilderback, Eugene Byrd
